transArray.content: The location of the hotel is easy to find, I come here often. There is free parking. The breakfast is very rich and has many kinds. It is also very close to the newly opened Chaoyang Railway Station. It is only a few minutes walk and it is convenient to return to my hometown.

Thank you very much for choosing Hanting among many hotels. Thank you for your support and recognition of the hotel. The hotel currently has a new breakfast feature. The robot can also deliver meals to the room. The hotel has a free laundry room. We look forward to your next stay.
